```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(matrixR)
context("Test ones*.")
```


## Results


```{r results}
A <- matrix(
  data = 1:9,
  ncol = 3
)
B <- ones(dim(A)[1])
B
C <- ones_from(A)
C
```


## testthat


```{r testthat, echo=TRUE}
test_that("I", {
  expect_equal(
    3,
    sum(B),
    sum(C)
  )
})
```
